name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY2】 [XJJXk28ivwY]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Slideshow of handwritten messages from fans and talents displayed on a large poster graphic.
Attention screen with safety warnings about lighting and cheering.
Promotion of 2nd Round Goods for the 3rd Generation Live concert.
Montage of short dance videos displayed in phone frames. Song lyrics begin.

subtitles.original: Attention: ご来場のお客様へ
照明の点滅にご注意ください / 声出し応援OKです
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights / Loud cheering is OK

subtitles.original: 2次販売グッズ グッズ販売期間 ~2.24 18:00
subtitles.english: 2nd Round Goods Sale: Available until Feb 24, 18:00

subtitles.original: あふれるこの気持ち きっと止まらない
subtitles.english: These overflowing feelings surely won't stop.
